title: About Time
overview: The story of a women who has the ability to see how long a person has left to live and the man she meets who somehow has the ability to stop her personal time clock. Their love will determine her fate.Choi Michaela is a musical actress who has a special ability to see a person's life span. She meets a man, Lee Do Ha who has an ability to stop her time-clock, and the two fall in love with each other.
